lead_paragraph: DIMON--Ted and Themis. It is with great sorrow we bid farewell to our special friends, Ted and Themis. Ted, renaissance man, and beautiful, intelligent and dear friend Themis. How much history, business, vacations we shared together. Those memories will be with us always. The time we spent together was indeed special. Our sincerest sympathies to the "boys", Peter, Jamie and Teddy, to their spouses, Judy and Tamara, and to the rest of this very close knit family. With love and tears, Joan and Sandy 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DIMON, TED AND THEMIS

snippet: DIMON--Ted and Themis. It is with great sorrow we bid farewell to our special friends, Ted and Themis. Ted, renaissance man, and beautiful, intelligent and dear friend Themis.
